name: dispersa-multi-platform
description: Multi-platform design token example: CSS, Tailwind, iOS (Swift), Android (Kotlin)

scripts.preview:web: pnpm build && cd previews/web && npx vite
scripts.preview:tailwind: pnpm build && cd previews/tailwind && npx vite
scripts.preview:ios: pnpm build && pnpm copy:ios && xcode previews/ios/Package.swift
scripts.preview:android: pnpm build && pnpm copy:android && open -a 'Android Studio' previews/android/
scripts.verify:ios: pnpm copy:ios && cd previews/ios && swift build
